name: Devil Userbot
description: A first Telegram Userbot with multi Clients for Spamming or Mass.

STRING_SESSION1.description: Fill with the Telethon session string from https://replit.com/@Itz-zaid/Generator

MONGO_URL.description: Fill with a MongoDB database URL from mongodb.com

SUDO_USERS.description: Fill with your user IDs. You can get your ID from @Zaid2_Robot by typing /id

OWNER_ID.description: Fill with your Telegram ID. You can get it from @Zaid2_Robot by typing /id

BOT_TOKEN.description: Fill with your Bot Token from @BotFather on Telegram
